body:
Suppress two `-Wmaybe-uninitialized` warnings in `indirect_ptr(...)`:

```
[Ã¢ÂÂ¦]
./prevector.h: In function Ã¢ÂÂbool IsWitnessStandard(const CTransaction&, const CCoinsViewCache&)Ã¢ÂÂ:
./prevector.h:162:79: warning: Ã¢ÂÂprevScript.prevector<28, unsigned char>::_union.prevector<28, unsigned char>::direct_or_indirect::<anonymous>.prevector<28, unsigned char>
     ::direct_or_indirect::<unnamed struct>::indirectÃ¢ÂÂ may be used uninitialized in this 
     function [-Wmaybe-uninitialized]

     T* indirect_ptr(difference_type pos) { return reinterpret_cast<T*>(_union.indirect) + pos; }
                                                                        ~~~~~~~^~~~~~~~

[Ã¢ÂÂ¦]
In file included from ./hash.h:11:0,
                 from ./pubkey.h:10,
                 from ./key.h:10,
                 from test/script_p2sh_tests.cpp:7:
./prevector.h: In member function Ã¢ÂÂvoid script_p2sh_tests::sign::test_method()Ã¢ÂÂ:
./prevector.h:162:79: warning: Ã¢ÂÂsigSave.prevector<28, unsigned char>::_union.prevector<28, unsigned char>::direct_or_indirect::<anonymous>.prevector<28, unsigned char>::direct_or_indirect::<unnamed struct>::indirectÃ¢ÂÂ may be used uninitialized in this function [-Wmaybe-uninitialized]
     T* indirect_ptr(difference_type pos) { return reinterpret_cast<T*>(_union.indirect) + pos; }
                                                                        ~~~~~~~^~~~~~~~
./prevector.h:181:69: warning: Ã¢ÂÂsigSave.prevector<28, unsigned char>::_union.prevector<28, unsigned char>::direct_or_indirect::<anonymous>.prevector<28, unsigned char>::direct_or_indirect::<unnamed struct>::indirectÃ¢ÂÂ may be used uninitialized in this function [-Wmaybe-uninitialized]
                 _union.indirect = static_cast<char*>(realloc(_union.indirect, ((size_t)sizeof(T)) * new_capacity));
                                                              ~~~~~~~^~~~~~~~
[Ã¢ÂÂ¦]
```
title: prevector: Suppress two -Wmaybe-uninitialized (gcc) warnings in indirect_ptr(...)
